headline: RXO Credit Downgrade Tests Debt Strategy In Shifting Truckload Supply
summary: Moody's recently cut RXO's credit rating to below investment grade after weaker fourth quarter results. Management flagged one of the largest structural changes to truckload supply since industry deregulation. The downgrade highlights higher perceived credit risk at a time of challenging freight market conditions. RXO (NYSE:RXO) is coming under fresh scrutiny after the Moody's downgrade, with the shares at $13.51 and showing a 20.1% decline over the past week and a 37.4% decline over the...
